Uses of Package
experiment

Packages that use experiment
experiment   
view   
 

Classes in experiment used by experiment
Experiment
          Experiment

Created for Tarun Gangwani in Fall, 2010 from his specifications and pseudocode

Created for a research project that tests subjects on their memorization ability

A dialog box will appear that asks for the file name that the list of words is located.
ListSorter
          ListSorter takes a Word object for each word, randomly deciding between tagging as either a target or foil.
StudyList
          Studylist creates a list of words that handles all the words in the "study list", i.e chosen randomly
TestList
          TestList contains an array of Words that can be manipulated Assumes the word list is of a size divisible by 4
Trial
          A trial is one trial during the test phase.
TrialHandler
          TrialHandler handles the list of trials for recording and ultimately the output into a JTable.
Word
          This class Word handles the classification and organization of specific words.
